channels.description: Comma-separated list of channel names or IDs where the file will be shared.

initial_comment.description: The message text introducing the file in specified `channels`.

content.description: File contents via a POST variable. If omitting this parameter, you must provide a `file`.

file.description: File contents via `multipart/form-data`. If omitting this parameter, you must submit `content`.

thread_ts.description: Provide another message's `ts` value to upload this file as a reply. Never use a reply's `ts` value; use its parent instead.
